00028 TableMutatorShared::TableMutatorShared(PropertiesPtr &props, Comm *comm,
00029     Table *table, RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator,
00030     ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue, uint32_t timeout_ms,
00031     uint32_t flush_interval_ms, uint32_t flags)
00032   : Parent(props, comm, table, range_locator, timeout_ms, flags),
00033     m_flush_interval(flush_interval_ms) {
00034 
00035   if (m_flush_interval)
00036     m_tick_handler = new TableMutatorIntervalHandler(comm, app_queue.get(), this);
00037 }
00038 
00039 
00040 TableMutatorShared::~TableMutatorShared() {
00041   if (m_tick_handler)
00042     m_tick_handler->stop();
00043 }

00046 void TableMutatorShared::auto_flush(Timer &timer) {
00047   ScopedRecLock lock(m_mutex);
00048   Parent::auto_flush(timer);
00049   m_last_flush_ts.reset();
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 void TableMutatorShared::interval_flush() {
00054   try {
00055     ScopedRecLock lock(m_mutex);
00056     HiResTime now;
00057 
00058     if (xtime_diff_millis(m_last_flush_ts, now) >= m_flush_interval) {
00059       HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"need to flush"<< HT_END;
00060       Parent::flush();
00061       m_last_flush_ts.reset();
00062     }
00063     else
00064       HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"no need to flush"<< HT_END;
00065   }
00066   HT_RETHROW("interval flush")
00067 }
